item.title: Setting Up an NGINX Reverse Proxy
item.description: If you’ve ever set up an application like Plex with a web server on a non-standard port, wanted a bit more security to go into accessing applications over networks that you may not fully trust, or even just wanted to ensure all of your requests to your web services just go to one place so you don’t have to mess with firewall rules every time you make something new then this article is for you.
